vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
WhaleGiveaway2.redeem (patch_11.sol#9-14) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_11.sol#11)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_11.sol#12)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_11.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_11.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in WhaleGiveaway2.execute (patch_11.sol#26-29):
	-require(bool)(to.call.value(value)(data)) patch_11.sol#28
